CONNECTION_ERROR_STRING.string: There was an error connecting to account

AWAY_STRING.comment: Label in buddy list for users that are away

BLOCK_AND_REMOVE_STRING.comment: The String for a buddy to block and remove a buddy from the buddy list

BUDDY_APPROVED_STRING.comment: Notification message when buddy has approved you

BUDDY_INFO_STRING.comment: The title for the view that shows detailed buddy info

CHATSECURE_PUSH_STRING.comment: Title for ChatSecure Push (this probably doesnt need to be translated)

COMPOSE_STRING.comment: Label for text field where you compose a new message

CONNECTED_STRING.comment: Whether or not account is logged in

CONNECTING_STRING.comment: String to state if an account is progress of creating a connection

CONNECTING_TO_TOR_STRING.comment: Message shown when connecting to the Tor network

ADD_EXISTING_STRING.comment: Label for button to create account by logging into an existing account

COPY_STRING.comment: Copy string to clipboard as in copy and paste

COPY_LINK_STRING.comment: Copy link URL to clipboard as in copy and paste

CREATED_BY_STRING.comment: Start of sentence that will be followed by names

CREATE_NEW_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: Label for button to create a new account via in band registration

CREATE_STRING.comment: Title for button to create account

CREATING_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: Title for progress of creating a new account

DELETE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to delete the stored account information

DELETE_ACCOUNT_TITLE_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to delete the stored account information

DELETE_CONVERSATIONS_ON_DISCONNECT_TITLE.comment: Title for automatic conversation deletion setting

DELIVERED_STRING.comment: Shows in the chat view when a message has been delivered

DEACTIVATE_STRING.comment: e.g. for deactivating your push account

DID_YOU_KNOW_DONATION_STRING.string: Did you know you can now help fund future development directly within the app?

DONATE_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Message shown when about to donate
DONATE_MESSAGE_STRING.string: Your donation will help fund the continued development of ChatSecure.

DONE_STRING.comment: Title for button to press when user is finished

DOWNLOAD_STRING.comment: Title for button to download something

DO_NOT_DISTURB_STRING.comment: Default message when a user status is set to do not disturb

EMAIL_STRING.comment: The string describing account name or email address for a buddy

ENABLE_DEBUG_LOGGING_STRING.comment: switch label for toggling debug logs

ENABLE_DEBUG_LOGGING_HELP_STRING.string: Beware! These logs are for debugging purposes only and will contain sensitive material like usernames, passwords, contacts, and message history. Disabling this option will delete all existing logs.

ERROR_CREATING_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: title label for error when creating account

ERROR_STRING.comment: Title of error message pop-up box

EXTENDED_AWAY_STRING.comment: Default message when a user status is set to extended away

INBOX_STRING.comment: segmented control value for active conversations

FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.comment: Text describing what happens when the user has forgotten the passphrase
FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.string: Because the database contents is encrypted with your passphrase, you've lost access to your data and will need to delete and reinstall ChatSecure to continue. Password managers like 1Password or MiniKeePass can be helpful for generating and storing strong passwords.

FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_STRING.comment: Label for button when you've forgotten the passphrase

GITHUB_STRING.comment: Name of popular web based hosting service

HELP_TRANSLATE_STRING.comment: Label for button to open link to translate app

HOSTNAME_STRING.comment: Label text for hostname field on login scree

INFO_STRING.comment: Short for information, button title to get more information

INVALID_EMAIL_DETAIL_STRING.comment: detail title label for invalid email
INVALID_EMAIL_DETAIL_STRING.string: Please choose a valid email address

IN_BAND_ERROR_STRING.comment: Error message for when in band registration is not supported
IN_BAND_ERROR_STRING.string: The XMPP server does not support in-band registration

JABBER_STRING.comment: the name for jabber, also include (XMPP) at the end

LANGUAGE_STRING.comment: string to bring up language selector

LOGIN_AUTOMATICALLY_STRING.comment: Label for account setting that autologins on launch

MANAGE_MY_KEYS.comment: Button to manage your OTR and OMEMO keys

MANAGE_CHATSECURE_PUSH_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: Title for button to manage ChatSecure Push account

MESSAGE_COULD_NOT_BE_SENT_STRING.comment: Explanation for why a message could not be sent.
MESSAGE_COULD_NOT_BE_SENT_STRING.string: The message could not be sent because this contact cannot receive your messages at this time. This could occur because they are offline, or if you are not authorized to send them messages.

MESSAGE_FRIENDS_WITH_NEW_INFO_STRING.comment: Title for toggle switch to spam your friends with your new account info

MIGRATION_FORM_DETAIL_STRING.comment: Description detail text for account migration form
MIGRATION_FORM_DETAIL_STRING.string: We will automatically migrate your contacts from your old account to the new one, and archive your old conversations.\n\nIf you'd like, we can also notify your existing contacts that your account has moved.

MIGRATION_INFO_STRING.comment: Explanation for why migration is needed
MIGRATION_INFO_STRING.string: Your account currently lives on the %1$@ servers. That chat service is no longer in service, so we're going to help move your account to a new server.

MIGRATION_INFO_WITH_DATE_STRING.comment: Explanation for why migration is needed, contains a shutdown date
MIGRATION_INFO_WITH_DATE_STRING.string: Your account currently lives on the %1$@ servers. That chat service is closing on %2$@, so we're going to help move your account to a new server.

MIGRATION_NOTIFICATION_STRING.comment: Explanation that your account has expired and you need to migrate

MIGRATION_NOTIFICATION_WITH_DATE_STRING.comment: Explanation that your account has expired and you need to migrate, contains a shutdown date
MIGRATION_NOTIFICATION_WITH_DATE_STRING.string: Your account is expiring in '%1$d' days.

MIGRATION_START_STRING.comment: Title for button to start migration tool

MIGRATE_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: Title for button to start migration tool

MIGRATED_BUDDY_STRING.comment: Title for migrated buddy header view

MIGRATED_BUDDY_INFO_STRING.comment: Explanation that buddy has a different prefered jid in the vcard
MIGRATED_BUDDY_INFO_STRING.string: Your buddy has a different forwarding address than the jid you are currently chatting with. Do you want to switch to this account instead?

MIGRATED_BUDDY_IGNORE.comment: Button to ignore the migrated buddy warning

MIGRATED_BUDDY_SWITCH.comment: Button to switch the chat over to the migrated account

MY_NEW_ACCOUNT_INFO_STRING.comment: label for new account info for migration

NAME_STRING.comment: The string describing a buddy's display name

NEW_CERTIFICATE_STRING.comment: Title for alert when a new SSL certificate is encountered

NEW_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: when a new message notification is received

NEXT_STRING.comment: Label for button to go to next step

OFFLINE_STRING.comment: Label in buddy list for users that are offline

OMEMO_GROUP_ENCRYPTION_STRING.comment: toggling switch for showing OMEMO group encryption

OMEMO_GROUP_ENCRYPTION_DETAIL_STRING.comment: toggling switch detail for showing OMEMO group encryption
OMEMO_GROUP_ENCRYPTION_DETAIL_STRING.string: Note: this does not automatically enable group encryption. It must also be manually enabled on a per-group basis.

OPEN_IN_SAFARI.comment: Label to open link in the Safari web browser

OPEN_IN_CHROME.comment: Label to open link in the chrome web browser

OPEN_IN_FACEBOOK_STRING.comment: Label for button to open link in facebook app

OPEN_IN_TWITTER_STRING.comment: Label for button to open link in twitter app

OPTIONAL_STRING.comment: Hint text for domain field telling user this field is not required

OTHER_STRING.comment: Title for other miscellaneous settings group

AUTO_URL_FETCH_STRING.comment: Title for other miscellaneous settings group

AUTO_URL_FETCH_WARNING_STRING.comment: Title for other miscellaneous settings group
AUTO_URL_FETCH_WARNING_STRING.string: All incoming messages containing URLs will be fetched by default to show a media preview. This is required for media messaging to work properly. Disable this if you do not trust your contacts.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_CONNECTION_ENDED_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_CONNECTION_ENDED_STRING.string: Message has not been sent because our buddy has ended the private conversation. We should either close the connection, or refresh it.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_ENCRYPTION_ERROR_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_ENCRYPTION_ERROR_STRING.string: An error occured while encrypting a message and the message was not sent.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_ENCRYPTION_REQUIRED_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_ENCRYPTION_REQUIRED_STRING.string: Our policy requires encryption but we are trying to send an unencrypted message out.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_LOG_HEARTBEAT_RCVD_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_FOR_OTHER_INSTANCE.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_FOR_OTHER_INSTANCE.string: Received and discarded a message intended for another instance.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_GENERAL_ERR_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_MALFORMED_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_MALFORMED_STRING.string: The message received contains malformed data.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_NOT_IN_PRIVATE_STR.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_NOT_IN_PRIVATE_STR.string: Received an encrypted message but cannot read it because no private connection is established yet.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_UNENCRYPTED_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_UNREADABLE_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_UNRECOGNIZED_STRIN.comment: Error string for OTR message string
OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_UNRECOGNIZED_STRIN.string: Cannot recognize the type of OTR message received.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_SETUP_ERROR_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string

PAYMENTS_SETUP_ERROR_STRING.string: This device doesn't seem to be configured to make payments.

PUBLIC_KEY_ERROR_STRING.string: Could not retrieve public key from certificate

RECENT_STRING.comment: Title for header of Buddy list view with Recent Buddies

REJECT_STRING.comment: Button title to reject a request such as a buddy request

REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.comment: Text that describes what remembering your passphrase does
REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.string: Your password will be stored in the iOS Keychain of this device only, and is only as safe as your device passphrase or pin. However, it will not persist during a device backup/restore via iTunes, so please don't forget it, or you may lose your conversation history.

REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_STRING.comment: Label for switch to save passphrase

REMEMBER_PASSWORD_STRING.comment: label for switch for whether or not we should save their password between launches

REMOVE_STRING.comment: The String for a button to remove a buddy from the buddy list

REQUIRED_STRING.comment: String to let user know a certain field like a password is required to create an account

RESOURCE_STRING.comment: Label for text input for XMPP resource

SAVED_CERTIFICATES_STRING.comment: Title for listing the user saved SSL certificates

PAYMENTS_UNAVAILABLE_STRING.comment: Title for alert when user isn't allowed to make payments

SAVE_STRING.comment: Title for button for saving a setting

SEARCH_STRING.comment: Label for text field where you search for a buddy

SECURITY_WARNING_STRING.comment: Title of alert box warning about security issues

SEND_FEEDBACK_STRING.comment: String on button to email feedback

SHARE_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Body of SMS or email when sharing a link to the app

YOU_HAVE_BEEN_INVITED_TO_GROUP_STRING.string: You have been invited to the ´%@´ group.

errSSLSessionNotFoundString.string: Attempt to restore an unknown session

RELEASE_TO_DELETE_STRING.comment: Label for instruction to delete current recording

SCAN_QR_STRING.comment: Label for sharing via QR Code

KNOCK_STRING.comment: Label for button after to send push notification knock. Like knocking on a door

KNOCK_SENT_STRING.comment: Text for label after knock is sent. Like knocking on a door

GROUP_REVOKE_MEMBERSHIP_STRING.comment: Label for revoking membership for someone in a group

SEND_PLAINTEXT_STRING.comment: The placeholder text in the chat view where the message should go

UNENCRYPTED_STRING.comment: Label for messages that are not encrypted

UNKNOWN_ERROR_STRING.comment: Describes an error without a known cause

USER_CANCELED_STRING.comment: Describes a state entered by user cancelation

ENABLE_PUSH_IN_SETTINGS_STRING.comment: button for enabling push messages in iOS system settings

NO_DEVICES_BUDDY_ERROR_STRING.string: We could not find any trusted devices for this contact.

RESEND_DESCRIPTION_STRING.comment: Describe what resending will do the %@ will be replaced withe the method OTR/OMEMO/Plaintext

THANK_YOU_FOR_CONTRIBUTION.comment: string shown if user has already paid

VIEW_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION_STRING.comment: Describe how to change a contact's device settings
VIEW_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION_STRING.string: View profile to review contact's devices or change encryption settings.

UNTRUSTED_DEVICE_SENT_STRING.string: This message was sent to an untrusted device.

UNTRUSTED_DEVICE_REVEIVED_STRING.string: This message was received from an untrusted device.

RESEND_MESSAGE_TITLE.comment: Ttitle for alert view to resend a message

Could_Not_Decrypt_Database.string: Could not decrypt database. If the app is not working properly, you may need to delete and reinstall.

Advanced_Crypto_Warning.string: Don't change these unless you really know what you're doing. By default we will always select the best available encryption method.

Microphone_Reenable_Please.string: To use this feature you must re-enable microphone permissions.

Unrecognized_Invite_Format.comment: shown when invite QR code doesnt work

NO_DEVICES_ACCOUNT_ERROR_STRING.comment: Error message for not finding any devices
NO_DEVICES_ACCOUNT_ERROR_STRING.string: We could not find any trusted devices for this account.

Nickname_String.comment: for choosing your XMPP vCard display name

Basic_Setup_Hint.string: Think of a unique nickname that you don't use anywhere else and doesn't contain personal information.

Generate_Secure_Password.comment: whether or not we should generate a strong password for them

Generate_Secure_Password_Hint.string: We can automatically generate you a secure password. If you choose your own, make sure it's a unique password you don't use anywhere else.

Customize_Username.comment: if you want to change your username

SERVER_INFORMATION_STRING.comment: button to show more information about your XMPP server

Server_String_Hint.string: Choose from a selection of public servers, or use your own.

PLEASE_CONTACT_SERVER_OP_STRING.comment: Error string for when there is a server configuration error.

NO_HTTP_UPLOAD_SERVERS_STRING.comment: Error string for when there are no XEP-0363 upload servers.

FILE_EXCEEDS_MAX_SIZE_STRING.comment: Error string for when file is too big.

Crash_Detected_Message.string: The app crashed last time it was launched. Send a crash report?

ACTIVE_STRING.comment: This will be displayed in the UI as 'Active 10m ago'

GROUP_INFO_YOU.comment: This will be shown after your own JID in the group profile view

ADD_FRIEND_TO_AUTO_DOWNLOAD.comment: Shown in chat view to prompt user to add friend for auto-download of group media messages.
ADD_FRIEND_TO_AUTO_DOWNLOAD.string: Is %@ your friend? Add him/her to auto-download pictures in the future.
